meanings.definition: Not large in size or amount
meanings.sent1: The ant is the smallest insect in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The ladybug is one of the smallest bugs you can find.
meanings.sent3: The smallest puppy tried to bark like a big dog.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the smallest whisper in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The smallest pebble made the biggest splash in the pond.

meanings.sent1: The smallest decision can sometimes have a big impact.
meanings.sent2: Even the smallest detail can change the whole picture.
meanings.sent3: The smallest problem turned into a big adventure.
meanings.sent4: His smallest gesture meant the world to her.
meanings.sent5: The smallest act of kindness can brighten someone's day.
